name: 5th Edition of International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies (Traditional Medicine 2023)
content: Conference Full Name: 5th Edition of International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies Conference Short Name: Traditional Medicine 2023 Conference Theme: Navigating the Future of Healthcare and Humankind Through the Healing Power of Nature Conference Venue: Tokyo, Japan Conference Address: Ana Crowne Plaza Narita 68, Horinouchi, Narita-Shi, Chiba, 286-0107 Tokyo, Japan Event Mode: Hybrid Event: both onsite and online versions / Virtual Reach us at: Contact Email: traditional-med@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988-2320 WhatsApp: +1 434 264 7183 Dates: May 22-23, 2023 Venue: Tokyo, Japan Website: https://traditionalmedicineconference.com/ Abstract submission: https://traditionalmedicineconference.com/submit-abstract Registration: https://traditionalmedicineconference.com/register Social Media Link: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ICTMconf Twitter: https://twitter.com/TraditionalConf YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Organiser: Magnus Group LLC - https://www.magnusgroup.org/ Conference Manager: Regina Brown Organiser Address: Magnus Group LLC 150 South Wacker Drive #2400 Chicago, IL 60606, USA Magnus Group extends a warm invitation to you to attend its hybrid event “5th Edition of International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies” slated during May 22-23, 2023 at Tokyo, Japan. The central theme of the global summit is “Navigating the Future of Healthcare and Humankind Through the Healing Power of Nature.” The two-day program will be jam packed with plenary sessions, scientific sessions, oral and poster presentations focusing on all frontier topics related to traditional medicine, ethnomedicine and natural therapies. The scientific room will be filled with keynote speakers, healthcare professionals, natural therapy specials, traditional medicine experts, young researchers, and renowned speakers from around the world. The congress will once again unite distinguished speakers and panelists to explore traditional and plant-based medicine. Through highly successful networking sessions, fascinating panel discussions, and presentations, the Traditional medicine 2023’s agenda goal is to advance research and knowledge transfer in the areas of traditional medicine, ethnomedicine and natural therapies. This conference will allow you to meet professionals, enhance your views, and keep up to current on Traditional Medicine. We can all work together to raise awareness of fatal infectious disease treatment through nature and Traditional Medicine 2023 is a great place to start.
